In my store, we have these magical cards that|can be used to create any effect you desire.|I give out the cards for free, but in order|

|long as you've removed all the effects, I'll|take it...

You come here often... This place has a lot|of money... But with the tower in such a|state, it's hard to do business. It would be|
|a great help to me if some of you fancy a|little help with Mr. Chakolotto.

38.「やめておくんだね。| ほしくなったら いつでも言ってくれ。|<bw_break: I'm not gonna... If you ever need anything,|just let me know...<bw_break>

39.「では 不思議のカードを お渡ししよう。| カードは 捨てることができないけど|: Now, I'm going to give you the mystery card.|You can't throw them away, but if you don't|want them, we'll take them...<bw_break>

Now that you've helped us defeat the demon,|we can finally get back to business. I'd like|to say thank you... Yes... I'm Ra, the card-|
|enhancer. At my store, we sell cards of|wonders that can be used to create any effect|you desire. I give out the cards for free,|
|but in order to add effects or enhancements,|you must pay for the necessary materials.|Once an effect is applied, it can be|
|reversed. And all the materials used for the|effect are returned to you. However, you will|need to pay a fee of <%nL_CARD_GOLD> gold to|
|remove the effect, so please be aware of|that... Also, you can't discard wonder|cards... If you want to discard a card you|
|don't need, as long as you've removed all the|effects, I'll take it...

45.「選択したカードを 回収するよ。| 本当に 良いかな？|<yesno 2><br: I'm going to retrieve the selected card. Are|you sure you want to do this?<yesno 2><break>
